title: Bhrugu Baxipatra

title: HA International
subtitle: Jeevan is a refugee from Pakistan living in Majnu ka Tila camp, Delhi. He migrated to Punjab to work as agricultural labourer, but met with an accident which has partially crippled him. He hasn't been provided with proper medical care and now he is unable to work. pic.twitter.com/ZJIrL1uwRb

title: Rita Singh
subtitle:
Doesn't India have obligation under UN to take care of refugees?

Yes, it does and has never showed away from it, but India is NOT OBLIGATED TO OFFER CITIZENSHIP. Each nation has own rules of naturalization. #CABBill2019 has nothing to do with offering/caring for refugees. pic.twitter.com/K2SjrQuC5l

subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Dumka, Jharkhand: To give respect to those (minority communities from Pakistan, Afghanistan, & Bangladesh) who fled to India & were forced to live as refugees, both houses of parliament passed the law (Citizenship Amendment). pic.twitter.com/IVa0SDCg5Q

title: ANI
